ChangeList.Description: Added the **hideFromAddressLists** and **hideFromOutlookClients** properties to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity, to control the visibility of a group in the Outlook UI.

Updated the behavior of the **appRoleAssignments** and **appRoleAssignedTo** relationships on [servicePrincipal](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal) to return the roles as documented. **appRoleAssignments** returns app roles granted to the service principal and **appRoleAssignedTo** returns principals granted app roles to the service principal.
Added the new entity type [accessPackageResourceRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accesspackageresourcerequest?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects
ChangeList.Description: Added support for returning a limited amount of information when your application does not have access to some of the types in a response's collection. For more details, see [Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-overview#limited-information-returned-for-inaccessible-member-objects).
ChangeList.Target: Limited information returned for inaccessible member objects

ChangeList.Description: Added new entity type: [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new delegated permissions [Application.Read.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions), [Application.ReadWrite.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions).
Added new application permission [Application.Read.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions).

Added new delegated and application permissions [GroupMember.Read.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#group-permissions) and [GroupMember.ReadWrite.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#group-permissions) to get and update the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new application permission [Group.Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#group-permissions) to create the **group** resource.
Added the **creationType** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation for the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added application-level Policy.Read.All permission for read operations in both conditional access policies and named locations.
Added support for report-only state: **enabledForReportingButNotEnforced**.
Updated the permissions required to perform write operations for both conditional access policies and named locations.
Added the **manufacturer** and **model** properties to the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new entity [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/calendarpermission-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs to manage [calendarPermission](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendarpermission?view=graph-rest-beta) resources on [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new complex type [onlineMeetingInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeetinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **isOnlineMeeting**, **onlineMeetingProvider** and **onlineMeeting** properties to the [event](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. **isOnlineMeeting** and **onlineMeetingProvider** are optional parameters to the [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-post-events?view=graph-rest-beta) and [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/event-update?view=graph-rest-beta) methods of **event**.

Added the **defaultOnlineMeetingProviders** and **allowedOnlineMeetingProviders** properties to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isTallyingResponses** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **isRemovable** property to the [calendar](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calendar?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **delegateMeetingMessageDeliveryOptions** property to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the **securityIdentifier** property to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **mdmAppId** property to the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new entity [certificateBasedAuthConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificatebasedauthconfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [certificateAuthority](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificateauthority?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new relationship for **certificateBasedAuthConfiguration** on the [organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. This enables [certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/active-directory-certificate-based-authentication-get-started).
ChangeList.Target: organization,certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory

ChangeList.Description: Added the **hideFromAddressLists** and **hideFromOutlookClients** properties to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity, to control the visibility of a group in the Outlook user interface.

Added the [assignLicense](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-assignlicense?view=graph-rest-beta) method which can be used to add or remove licenses on users in a [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added new entities: [authenticationDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta), [keyValue](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/keyValue?view=graph-rest-beta), [networkLocationDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/networkLocationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the **alternateSignInName**, **ServicePrincipalId**, **ServicePrincipalName**, and **authenticationProcessingDetails** properties to the [signIn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Moved the reference to [mfaDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mfadetail?view=graph-rest-beta) from [signIn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signin?view=graph-rest-beta) to [authenticationDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationDetail?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **signInActivity** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added a new entity type: [Trustframeworkkeyset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/trustframeworkkeyset?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added new entity type: [Identityuserflow](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityuserflow?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added new [entitlement management](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/entitlementmanagement-overview?view=graph-rest-beta) resources.

Added [removePassword](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-removepassword?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added **addIns** property to the [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [addPassword](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-addpassword?view=graph-rest-beta) and [removePassword](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-removepassword?view=graph-rest-beta) methods to the [serviceprincipal](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **onPremisesDomainName**, **onPremisesNetBiosName**, and **onPremisesSamAccountName** properties to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.
Added the **securityIdentifier** property to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **mdmAppId** property to the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **manufacturer** and **model** properties to the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added new [orgContact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. These contacts are managed by the organization, and are different from [personal contacts](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/outlook-contacts-concept-overview)
Added new [physicalOfficeAddress](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/physicalOfficeAddress?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added new entity [certificateBasedAuthConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificatebasedauthconfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added new complex type [certificateAuthority](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificateauthority?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new relationship for **certificateBasedAuthConfiguration** on the [organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. This enables [certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/active-directory-certificate-based-authentication-get-started).
ChangeList.Target: organization,certificate-based authentication in Azure Active Directory

ChangeList.Description: Added new entity types: [conditionalAccessPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPolicy),

Added new complex types: [conditionalAccessSessionControl](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControl), [applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/applicationEnforcedRestrictionsSessionControl), [cloudAppSecuritySessionControl](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudAppSecuritySessionControl), [signInFrequencySessionControl](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signInFrequencySessionControl), [persistentBrowserSessionControl](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/persistentBrowserSessionControl), [conditionalAccessSessionControls](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessSessionControls), [conditionalAccessApplications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessApplications), [conditionalAccessUsers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessUsers), [conditionalAccessPlatforms](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessPlatforms), [conditionalAccessLocations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessLocations), [conditionalAccessDeviceStates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessDeviceStates), [conditionalAccessConditionSet](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessConditionSet), [conditionalAccessGrantControls](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessGrantControls),
Added the [namedLocation API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/namedLocation?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents named locations in Azure AD conditional access.

Added the [user: reprocessLicenseAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-reprocesslicenseassignment?view=graph-rest-beta) API, which can be used to reprocess all group-based license assignments for the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the new **lastPasswordChangeDateTime** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

The **dateFormat** and **timeFormat** properties to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource. The properties represent the user's preferred date and time formats.
Added the [objectIdentity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/objectIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that represents an identity used to sign in to a user account.
Added **synchronizationJobSettings** property to the [synchronizationJob](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-synchronizationjob?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added new possible values for the **reason** property in the [synchronizationQuarantine](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/synchronization-quarantine?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the capability to manage password single sign on credentials on the [servicePrincipal object](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the **identities** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This property represents the set of identities that this user can use to sign in with.

The **dateFormat** and **timeFormat** properties to the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. The properties represent the user's preferred date and time formats.
Added the [translateExchangeIds](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-translateexchangeids?view=graph-rest-1.0) method.
Changed the [List provisioningObjectSummary](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/provisioningobjectsummary-list?view=graph-rest-beta) namespace.

Added the [roleManagement](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/roleManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that provides access to role definitions and role assignments surfaced from RBAC providers.

Added the [unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that represents a collection of permissions listing the operations that can be performed.
Added the [unifiedRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unifiedRoleAssignment?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that grants access to resources.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List unifiedRoleDefinitions,Create unifiedRoleDefinition,Get unifiedRoleDefinition,Update unifiedRoleDefinition,Delete unifiedRoleDefinition
ChangeList.Description:
Added these operations to support the unifiedRoleDefinition resource:
  • [List unifiedRoleDefinitions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) - Get a list of unifiedRoleDefinition objects for the provider.
  • [Create unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-post-roledefinitions?view=graph-rest-beta) - Create a new unifiedRoleDefinition object.
  • [Get unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-get?view=graph-rest-beta) - Retrieve the properties and relationships of a unified role definition object.
  • [Update unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-update?view=graph-rest-beta) - Update the properties of a unifiedRoleDefinition object.
  • [Delete unifiedRoleDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroledefinition-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) - Delete a unifiedRoleDefinition object.
ChangeList.Target: List unifiedRoleDefinitions,Create unifiedRoleDefinition,Get unifiedRoleDefinition,Update unifiedRoleDefinition,Delete unifiedRoleDefinition

ChangeList.Description:
Added these operations to support the unifiedRoleAssignment resource:
  • [List unifiedRoleAssignments](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/rbacapplication-list-roleassignments?view=graph-rest-beta) - Get a list of unifiedRoleAssignment objects for the provider.
  • [Create unifiedRoleAssignment]() - Create a new unifiedRoleAssignment object.
  • [Get unifiedRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignment-get?view=graph-rest-beta) - Retrieve the properties and relationships of a unifiedRoleAssignment object.
  • [Delete unifiedRoleAssignment](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/unifiedroleassignment-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) - Delete a unifiedRoleAssignment object.
Added the [List accessReviews](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/accessreview-list?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-beta) operation for the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [checkMemberObjects](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-checkmemberobjects?view=graph-rest-beta) operation for the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added delegated and application [permissions for reading organizational contacts](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#organizational-contact-permissions): OrgContact.Read.All
Added new entity [certificateBasedAuthConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/certificatebasedauthconfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.Description: Added [new delegated and application permissions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference?#organization-permissions) _AdministrativeUnit.Read.All_ and _AdministrativeUnit.ReadWrite.All_ to get and update the [administrative unit API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

ChangeList.Description: Added the [riskDetection API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskdetection?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents risk detections in Azure AD Identity Protection.

Introduced the new resource type [applicationTemplate](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/applicationtemplate). This resource type supports [instantiate](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-instantiate), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-instantiate) and [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/applicationtemplate-get) applications from the Azure AD application gallery.

Added new resources: [detailsInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/detailsInfo?view=graph-rest-beta), [initiator](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/initiator?view=graph-rest-beta), [modifiedProperty](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/modifiedProperty?view=graph-rest-beta), [provisionedIdentity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisionedIdentity?view=graph-rest-beta), [provisioningObjectsummary](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioningObjectsummary?view=graph-rest-beta), [provisioningStep](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/provisioningStep?view=graph-rest-beta), **provisioningsystemDetails**, [statusBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/statusBase?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the [List provisioningObjectSummary](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/provisioningobjectsummary-list?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.
Added the **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** property on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [revokeSignInSessions](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-revokesigninsessions?view=graph-rest-1.0) action on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **lastPasswordChangeDateTime** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added **assignedlabels** property to the [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity. This property represents the list of sensitivity label pairs (label ID, label name) associated with a group.
Added the [riskyUserHistoryItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuserhistoryitem?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added the [list history](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/riskyuser-list-history?view=graph-rest-beta) operation.

Added new application permissions for **access reviews** APIs: AccessReview.Read.All, ProgramControl.Read.All and ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All. For details, see the [access reviews API reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta).

Add the **signInSessionsValidFromDateTime** property on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This is a rename of the **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** properties, but both properties will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly. In the next couple months the old property, **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** will be removed.

Add the **revokeSignInSessions** action on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This is a rename of the **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** action, but both service actions will be supported to allow clients to migrate smoothly. In the next couple months the old service action, **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** will be removed.

Introduced a new resource type [trustFrameworkPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) to support [Azure Active Directory B2C](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory-b2c/active-directory-b2c-overview). This resource type supports  [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-post-trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-list-trustframeworkpolicies?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframeworkpolicy-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframework-put-trustframeworkpolicy?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/trustframeworkpolicy-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) operations.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: audit logs APIs for Azure AD
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new **audit logs APIs for Azure AD** providing activity logs for directory management tasks through [directoryAudit](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryAudit?view=graph-rest-1.0) and sign-in activity through [signIns](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/signIn?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Add the **passwordNotificationWindowInDays** and **passwordValidityPeriodInDays** properties on the [domain](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Add the **complianceExpirationDateTime**, **profileType** and **systemLabels** properties on the [device](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Add the **isResourceAccount** property on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Introduced [Confirm riskyUsers compromised](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/riskyusers-confirmcompromised?view=graph-rest-beta) method, which allows admins to confirm users as compromised in Azure AD Identity Protection.

Introduced [Dismiss riskyUsers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/riskyusers-dismiss?view=graph-rest-beta) method, which allows admins to dismiss users marked as risky in Azure AD Identity Protection.
Introduced **isProcessing** property to the [riskyUser](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuser?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

The [targetResource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/targetresource?view=graph-rest-beta) type now includes properties previously available to derived types that are no longer supported.

The following derived types are no longer supported and have been removed: **targetResourceDevice**, **targetResourceDirectory**, **targetResourceGroup**, **targetResourcePolicy**, **targetResourceRole**, **targetResourceServicePrincipal**, **targetResourceUser**, and **targetResourceOther**.

Add the **passwordNotificationWindowInDays** and **passwordValidityPeriodInDays** properties on the [domain](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added new resource type [directoryObjectPartnerReference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryobjectpartnerreference?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Add the **createdDateTime** property on [organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Updated the **companyName** property on the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource to be writeable.

To support configuring an identity provider in an Azure AD B2C tenant, introduced new resource type [identityProvider](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity and the [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) operations.
Added the **createdDateTime** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-1.0). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-1.0), [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [devices](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new properties to [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0): **employeeId**, **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, **showInAddressList** and **otherMails**.
Added the **forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa** property to the [passwordProfile](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordprofile?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type.

Added the **licenseAssignmentStates** property to the [User](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).
Added the **licenseAssignmentState** resource for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added the **assignedLicenses**, **licenseProcessingState** and **hasMembersWithLicenseErrors** properties and **membersWithLicenseErrors** relationship to [Group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added new entity [dataPolicyOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/datapolicyoperation?view=graph-rest-1.0). This represents a submitted data policy operation for tracking purposes.

Added the [exportPersonalData](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-exportpersonaldata?view=graph-rest-1.0) action on [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/users?view=graph-rest-1.0). This action submits a data policy operation request to export personal data stored by Microsoft for a user.
Added method [dataPolicyOperations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/datapolicyoperation-get?view=graph-rest-1.0). This retrieves properties of the dataPolicyOperation object.

Added new property **expirationDateTime** to [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) for [group expiration](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/users-groups-roles/groups-lifecycle).
Added new resource type [directoryObjectPartnerReference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryobjectpartnerreference?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the **createdDateTime** property to the [organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Restructured the [organizational contacts](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. The physical address properties (**city**, **country**, **postalCode**, **streetAddress**, and **state**) and **officeLocation** are now in an **addresses** collection (of new [physicalOfficeAddress](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/physicalofficeaddress?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type), and **mobilePhone**, **businessPhones** and **faxNumber** are now in a **phones** collection. **companyName** and **imAddresses** have also been added

Added method **memberOf** to get a [devices](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0) direct [membership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-memberOf?view=graph-rest-1.0). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added property **registeredRoot** to the [governanceResource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Renamed property **onboardDateTime** of the [governanceResource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/governanceresource?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to **registeredDateTime**.
Added new action [register resource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/governanceresource-register?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new  **progress** property to [dataPolicyOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/dataPolicyOperation?view=graph-rest-beta). This specifies the progress of an operation.

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-beta). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta), [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta), [devices](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [service principals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added method memberOf to get a devices direct [membership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-memberof?view=graph-rest-beta). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added new properties to [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta): **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, and **otherMails**.
Added the **forceChangePasswordNextSignInWithMfa** property to the [passwordProfile](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordprofile?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added the 'externalUserState' and 'externalUserStateChangeDateTime' properties to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) object.

Added the [forceDelete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-forcedelete?view=graph-rest-1.0) action to [domains](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added new method transitiveMembers on [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivemembers?view=graph-rest-beta). This method returns a flat list of members including nested members.

Added new method transitiveMemberOf on [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta), [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta), [devices](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta) and [service principals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/serviceprincipal-list-transitivememberof?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added method memberOf to get a devices direct [membership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/device-list-memberof?view=graph-rest-beta). This method has been added for getting the list of memberships including nested memberships.
Added new properties to [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta): **faxNumber**, **onPremisesDistinguishedName**, and **otherMails**.

Added the **licenseAssignmentStates** property to the [User](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).
Added the **licenseAssignmentState** resource for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Added the **assignedLicenses**, **licenseProcessingState**, **hasMembersWithLicenseErrors** and **membersWithLicenseErrors** properties to [Group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity for [Group Based Licensing](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/active-directory-licensing-whatis-azure-portal).

Introduced [riskyUsers API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/riskyuser?view=graph-rest-beta), which represents Azure AD users who are at risk, as detected by Azure AD Identity Protection.
Change the **privilegedapproval** entity.
Added the **privilegedroleassignmentrequest** entity, and following methods and actions: List, Create, Cancel, My.
Added Update for **privilegedRoleSettings**.

Added [delta query](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview) capability for [directoryObject](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryobject?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added **delta** function for [directoryRole](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryrole?view=graph-rest-1.0) to support [change tracking using delta query](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/delta-query-overview).
Alternative behavior to return changed properties only in JSON response for [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Alternative behavior to return changed properties only in JSON response for [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).

The [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) and [servicePrincipal](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on July 16, 2018. The changes include property renaming and restructuring. Most of the existing properties will not be available until the changes are completed. There will be new properties added. The changes will be released in preview (beta) prior to releasing to v1.0.

Added the [access reviews](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/accessreviews-root?view=graph-rest-beta) feature to [Azure AD](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/azure-ad-overview?view=graph-rest-beta).

New application permissions _Application.ReadWrite.All_ and _Application.ReadWrite.OwnedBy_ that allows a client app to create, read, update, and delete applications and service principals as described in the [permissions topic](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#application-resource-permissions).
Added **ageGroup**, **legalAgeGroupClassification**, and **ConsentRequiredForMinor** properties to [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [privilegedAccess](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedaccess?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the [outlookCategory](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookcategory?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity.

Added the following CRUD operations for [outlookCategory](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/outlookcategory?view=graph-rest-1.0): [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookuser-post-mastercategories?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-update?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/outlookcategory-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0).

ChangeList.Target: restoring and permanently deleting users and groups

ChangeList.Description: Added the [agreement](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreement?view=graph-rest-beta) and [agreementAcceptance](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreementacceptance?view=graph-rest-beta) resources.

Added the following APIs for [agreement](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreement?view=graph-rest-beta): [Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/termsofusecontainer-post-agreements?view=graph-rest-beta), [List](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [Get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [Delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/agreement-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [agreementAcceptance](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/agreementacceptance?view=graph-rest-beta) relationships to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Add optional delta query filtering capability to [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Add optional delta query filtering capability to [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-delta?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added the [identityProvider](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identityprovider?view=graph-rest-beta) entity and the [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-post-identityproviders?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-update?view=graph-rest-beta), and [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/identityprovider-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) operations.

Added the new **workingHours** property to [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-beta). See [workingHours resource type](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-beta) for information on the supported use cases.

Added the following new complex types:
[workingHours](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workinghours?view=graph-rest-beta)
[timeZoneBase](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timezonebase?view=graph-rest-beta)
[customTimeZone](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/customtimezone?view=graph-rest-beta)
[standardTimeZoneOffset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/standardtimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-beta)
[daylightTimeZoneOffset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/daylighttimezoneoffset?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added [groupLifecyclePolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/grouplifecyclepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added the following APIs for group lifecycle policy: [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-post-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-beta), [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [update](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-update?view=graph-rest-beta), [delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [add group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-addgroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [remove group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-removegroup?view=graph-rest-beta), and [renew a group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/grouplifecyclepolicy-renewgroup?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added [List groupLifecylePolicies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-grouplifecyclepolicies?view=graph-rest-beta) function to [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **employeeId** property to [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added support for group settings., New resource types: [groupSetting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/groupsetting?view=graph-rest-1.0), [groupSettingTemplate](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/groupsettingtemplate?view=graph-rest-1.0), [settingValue](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settingvalue?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [settingTemplateValue](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/settingtemplatevalue?view=graph-rest-1.0)
Added property **classification** and navigation property **settings**  to [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0)

Changed roleMemberInfo property type to [identity](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/identity?view=graph-rest-1.0) for [scopedRoleMembership](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/scopedrolemembership?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Changed navigation property scopedAdministratorOf to scopedRoleMemberOf for [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Changed navigation property scopedAdministrators to scopedRoleMembers for [administrativeUnit](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Changed navigation property scopedAdministrators to scopedMembers for [directoryRole](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directoryrole?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
Added support for [restoring and permanently deleting users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta).

changelog.WorkloadArea: Added user resource support for deleted items

ChangeList.Description: New entity: [OnPremisesProvisioningError](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added OnPremisesProvisioningError property to [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta), [group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta), and [orgcontact](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/orgcontact?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added the **drives** and **sites** navigation properties to **group**.

Adminstrative unit APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on May 3, 2017. The changes include the following property renaming:
- **roleMemberInfo** complex type to **identity** complex type for the scopedRoleMembership entity
- **scopedAdministratorOf** navigation property to **scopedRoleMemberOf** for the user entity
- **scopedAdministrators** navigation property to **scopedRoleMembers** for the administrativeUnit entity
- **scopedAdministrators** navigation property to **scopedMembers** for the directoryRole entity

The [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) and [servicePrincipal](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/serviceprincipal?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs will be updated in preview (beta). The first set of changes will be applied on May 15, 2017. The changes include property renaming and restructuring. Some properties (such as appRoles and addIns) will not be available until the changes are completed. The changes will be released in preview (beta) prior to releasing to v1.0.

Added new onPremises properties onPremisesDomainName, OnPremisesSamAccountName, and onPremisesUserPrincipalName to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added **HiddenMembership** as an additional value for the visibility property to the [Group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) entity
New resource:</br>[contract](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contract?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added functions on [domains](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta)., New entities:</br>[domain](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domain?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsCnameRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnscnamerecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsMxRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsmxrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsSrvRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnssrvrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsTxtRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnstxtrecord?view=graph-rest-beta), [domainDnsUnavailableRecord](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/domaindnsunavailablerecord?view=graph-rest-beta), New actions:</br>[forceDelete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-forcedelete?view=graph-rest-beta)</br>[verify](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/domain-verify?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added support for [restoring and permanently deleting groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/directory?view=graph-rest-beta)., New entity: directory with deleteditems navigation property.
New entity:</br>[Endpoint](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/endpoint?view=graph-rest-beta)

New [endpoints](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-list-endpoints?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property on [groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta)
New entity:</br>[licenseDetails](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/licensedetails?view=graph-rest-beta)

New [licensedetails](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-licensedetails?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property on [users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta)
New entity:</br>[contract](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contract?view=graph-rest-beta)
Added invitedUserType property to the invitation entity type, that defines the type of user (**Guest** or **Member**) that is invited.

We will be removing the invitedToGroups property from the invitation entity-type on 11/11/2016. This means that you will no longer be able to add an invited user to a group using this API. Instead, use the [add member API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/group-post-members?view=graph-rest-1.0) to add a user to a group.
Added **membershipRule** property contains rules that controls the memberships for this group, if the group is a dynamic group.
Added **membershipRuleProcessingState** property to control whether dynamic membership processing is on or paused for this group.
Set the **groupTypes** property to contain **"DynamicMembership"** to light up the dynamic groups capability for this group.
Added **preferredLanguage** property to indicate the preferred language for a Microsoft 365 group.
Added **theme** property to specify a Microsoft 365 group's color theme.

As part of the schema change where the type of two location properties is being replaced by a new complex type in the identityRiskEvents endpoint, the following properties are changed/added in the identityRiskEvents endpoint:</br>**location**  changed from Edm.String to ComplexType signInLocation., **previousLocation** changed from Edm.String to ComplexType signInLocation., **signInLocation** new ComplexType that contains city, state, countryOrRegion and geoCoordinates properties., **geoCoordinates** new ComplexType that contains latitude and longitude properties.

Invitation manager APIs are now available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. You can use invitation manager APIs to create an invite, in order to add an external user to the organization. As part of the invitation, you can also choose to add the invited user to a Microsoft 365 group. For more details, see [invitation manager](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** read-only property to indicate when refresh or session tokens are valid from. Any tokens issued before this time are invalid, and any attempt to use them would force a new sign-in for the user.
Added **showInAddressList** property to control if the Outlook global address list should contain this user.

Added **invalidateAllRefreshTokens** service action that invalidates all of the user's refresh and session tokens issued to applications, by resetting the **refreshTokensValidFromDateTime** user property to the current date-time.

Added the [mailboxSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/mailboxsettings?view=graph-rest-1.0) complex type, which includes the **automaticRepliesSetting**, **timeZone**, and **language** properties.
Added the **mailboxSettings** property to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Privileged Identity Management,Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta,Azure AD Privileged Identity Management
ChangeList.Description: Privileged Identity Management (PIM) REST APIs now are available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. [Privileged Identity Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) provides just in time activation for privileged Azure AD organizational roles such as Global Administrator, Billing Administrator, and so on. You can use the published APIs to write applications that retrieve and update privileged role assignments, and activate users into roles. For details, see [Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) and [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: Privileged Identity Management,Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta,Azure AD Privileged Identity Management

ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new Administrative Unites preview API. Administrative units allow organizations to subdivide their Azure Active Directory, and delegate administrative duties to those subdivisions. Subdivisions can represent regions, departments, cost centers, etc. This can now be managed through the Microsoft Graph API.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the new IdentityRiskEvents preview API. This API works in conjunction with Azure Active Directory Identity Protection. You can use it to query risk events generated by Identity Protection. For more details, see the [Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/identityriskevents-api-preview/) blog post.
ChangeList.Target: Introduction of a new preview API to Microsoft Graph: IdentityRiskEvents

ChangeList.Description: Added _extensions_ to the **post** entity, which is abstract type to support the OData v4 open type openTypeExtension.
Added _timeZone_ to _mailboxsettings_.
Added API _findMeetingTimes_to _user_.
Added _inferenceClassification_ resource type.
Added _mailboxSettings_ property and corresponding types.
_displayName_ is now returned for Microsoft accounts.
Added the `aadHeaderBased` and `pingHeaderBased` values to the **singleSignOnMode** enumeration.
